name: Online @ The Perfect Time
description:
"With your exams coming up faster than you imagined, you needed to let off some steam and whilst waiting for take-out you stumbled on what seemed to be a new show. Soon enough you were diving head first into a new fandom. Will your heart be steady enough to embrace these new relationships or will the stress of it all cause you to make choices you wished to forget?" 

///

It’s the mid 00’s, everything is going well! Until it’s not, until you’re stressed and overwhelmed with the realisation that university is over soon. Hopping on the procrastination train is the best option, you take a breather from assignments and relax, I mean it is getting late and you’re getting really hungry. You stop on a show for a few minutes, but wait, it’s? actually good? That doesn’t usually happen..but I mean it couldn’t hurt to watch right?...

….

Online @ the perfect time follows you, a student in their final year of university, overwhelmed with what’s to come afterwards. After stumbling across a new anime, you decide to search the web for something more, anything, to elevate your stress and continue this train of procrastination.

Nothing is thought of it at first, until you meet a group of new friends who are more welcoming than you could’ve ever imagined. This visual novel explores friendship, romance (hopefully) and a whole lot of 00’s dumbassery.

This game is a small demo made for Otome Jam 2022! The full game will be released at a later date, please check in for updates or follow us on Twitter Tumblr or join our discord for updates ^^ 

Demo Features: 

  • Play through the first 2 days of the game's narrative!
  • 10-15 minutes of gameplay with 6k+ words
  • Join a new fandom - browse & comment on posts in a fan forum 
  • Meet our 3 LIs

Full release features: 

  • 9 in-game days to play through 
  • 3 routes, 6 endings, 40k~ words
  • Browse BG! fanforum, fanspace homepage & more
  • Instant messenger, finally chat with everyone live!

And hopefully…

  • Video calls with LIs
  • Voice Acting 
  • Unlockable achievements 
  • Secret endings 

Content Warning: 

  • Bad language, fuck
  • Cringey 00s internet slang XD 

Unfortunately we were unable to include accessibility features (dyslexic friendly font, self-voicing etc) into our game demo in time for the Otome Jam deadline but we are working to get those features added ASAP! Thank you for your patience.   We also were not able to get a QA team together for mac so we've had to hold off on that until the full release, we're so sorry!
